lines.text: What's your dog's name?
I don't know. He never told me.
He doesn't make sense, I don't make sense, together we make sense.
I wonder if you think about me.
Of course I think about you!
I wasn't finished!
Finish.
I wonder if you think about me half as much as I think about you.
You love with your mind and soul, not actually with your heart. It's just a saying.

[Holding her hand to his chest]
Why does it hurt so much here you're not with me?
What worries me is when someone as screwed up as these guys doesn't want me!
He was like an angel, you know? I never knew life could be like that. He was the one thing I followed through in my life, the one thing I didn't give up on. I was good at loving him.
I am going to fall in love with you. You don't have to love me back. I am going to give you my heart.
You are like wet sand in my underwear.
Ouch.
Do you like music, Caroline?
Mmm. That's the first time I heard you say my name. It sounded... nice.
Would you like to listen to my records Caroline?... Caroline.
Adam your heart is diseased! You need a new one.
But this is my heart! I'm afraid that if they take it away I won't be able to love you the same.
You don't have to come as my boyfriend or anything. Though I'd like you to.
[Adam nods]
Is that a yes?
Yes.
Say yes again.
Yes.
I follow you home...
You follow me home?
I wasn't finished.
Finish.
I follow you home to make sure you're... safe.
Well I never see you.
I stay pretty far behind. I'm sorry.
Well, I mean, don't be sorry... I just...
I wasn't finished.
Finish.
I am sorry I was late that night.
I have fallen...
Are you hurt?
I wasn't finished.
Finish.
I have fallen so in love with you, so much more than I said I would.
I love hockey.
You didn't even know what a power-play was.
I know. But next time you can tell me.
You are my peace.
[about her dad]
First guy to walk out of my life, definetly not the last. Funny things, you and me. You always stayin' away from love, me always chasin' after it.
Don't let people stand in your way. They're just people. like you and me! Well, maybe not like you. I don't know if I have ever met anyone like you before.
I think I'll go inside now.
I'll call you later, alright?
No, don't do that. Just leave me alone.
I didn't mean to hurt you, Caroline.
Yeah, well. You did.
My life is like watching The Three Stooges in Spanish!
I never hear you speak and when you do you apologize for saving me?
Star light, Star bright, First star I see tonight, I wish I may wish I might I might, Have this wish I wish tonight.
That's mars.
What?
That's mars. You just wished on a planet.
Figures.
What did the doctor say?
That I'm not allowed to stick knives in my stomach.
It's your birthday and you got me a present?
Too bad though. He is kinda cuta. I'd do him. If he just wasn't so dumb!
Once people got use to staying away, they always stayed away. I never got close to anybody.
[During her beauty exam]
Lady, I'm not butchering your hair! It's a free haircut so stop your bitching before I cut it all off, you fat cow!
When did you get here?
Ten.
Ten? That was almost two hours ago. You'd rather be out here with my cat than inside with...
[realizing]
than inside with a room full of strangers and relatives.
Magic records and a baboon heart...
It's not right to feel shitty this time of year, but everybody does. It's like this is life and once you go through it long enough you realize what the flavor is. And it sure ain't vanilla!
Look at him! He looks like a tumor sittin' over there. Ugh, and his hair! It just bothers me so much!
I am not very good with people.
